page.title: 08KEEPING HEALTHY COVENTRY SW.
page.content: {DIET} Doctors and dentists want us to stop eating between meals.We are being encouraged to eat less fat,sugar and salt and to eat more fibre. {TOOTH DECAY Education and fluoridation have helped to improve childrens teeth.One infants school in the area recently had an intake of new children with no tooth decay. {DISEASE Babies can now be immunised against these dangerous diseases:Whooping cough,polio,diptheria,tetanus and measles. {EXERCISE Running has become a popular way of keeping fit.It is called jogging.
